snippet: Why is it morally permissible to blame clients for their lawyers’ mistakes?
abstract: Adam Liptak Sidebar column asks why it is morally permissible to blame clients for their lawyers' mistakes, such as missing filing deadlines, especially in capital cases.
lead_paragraph: Why is it morally permissible to blame clients for their lawyers’ mistakes?
